action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1320 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 46. Record Vote Number: 50.
Amendment SA 1320 proposed by Senator Cramer for Senator Rubio. (consideration: CR S1036; text: CR S1036) To amend the findings.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1320 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 46. Record Vote Number: 50.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1320 proposed by Senator Cramer for Senator Rubio.
